website_summaries.verdict: The best budget 3.5mm microphone option for the best noise-free audio quality.
pros: Features noise-cancellation to reduce and limit the amount of audio artifacts and distortion
Microphone automatically works with any audio recorder with a 3.5mm jack or adapter
Designed to work with all Apple devices
cons: Parts broke easily for some users

website_summaries.verdict: Excellent sound quality and easy to use for an affordable price.
pros: An omnidirectional microphone that uses a 3.5 millimeter jack so you can plug into iOS, Android, and Windows devices, and then clip the microphone onto your shirt
Comes with 3 muffs, a 79-inch extension cord, and a storage case
Excellent sound quality and also blocks out background noises
cons: Doesn't work with newer Apple devices that use a lightning connection, and the lightning to 3.5 millimeter adapter doesn't always work

customer_reviews.title: Great microphone. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: This works great. Love the extension cord. You can stand about 10 feet from the camera no problem. Very sensitive. Picks up a whisper well. If you’ll be outdoors get some wind mufflers just to better block that out. They have five packs for about twelve bucks.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Great Lapel Mic - better than many more expensive ones!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this lapel mic as a last resort. I have spent hundreds of dollars on wireless lapel mics that didn't have the quality of the PowerDeWise lapel mic. I am very impressed with the sound quality. The adapter is a God send, as I needed it to connect this to my Cannon Rebel T6i. (Other lapel mics don't come with the adapter.) I also really like the extension cord that allows me to step further away from the camera. The video below has no audio enhancements so you can hear the difference between the Rode boom mic and the PowerDeWise lapel mic.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Walker

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Usually when I'm video recording at noisy areas I have to speak so looud even shout, I purchased and tested and I can tell you it is GREAT, premium materials (not expected for price), excelent quality when recording, does its job great. Here is a quick test video (in spanish)
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Gaxiola

customer_reviews.title: BEST BUDGET LAV. BETTER THAN RODE VIDEO MICRO.
customer_reviews.text: This a top notch professional Lav mic. Coming from a video guy with some experience in audio. Be sure to also pick up the deadcat to go with it. It's so good it doesn't need it in light windy conditions, but all wind will go away with the deadcat when things get extra windy.
customer_reviews.author: Jalen Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: I use this mic to film youtube videos. I love it. It greatly enhances the audio quality. It's super easy to use, small, and has a great clip so I can pin the mic on my shirt very easily. I love that the cord is long, and it even came with extra cord should I want to make it longer. This is the first mic I've purchased so I have nothing to compare it to, but I am extremely happy with my choice, and have no need to look any further.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Awesome mic just have to talk a little quieter this ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome mic just have to talk a little quieter this mic picks up nose hairs flappin if your not careful..EDIT i figured out how to set the lav mic up correctly :)..
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Great Microphone for the Price! Better then the others.
customer_reviews.text: Tested and reviewed the PowerDeWise Lapel Microphone and was pleasantly surprised. It needs no battery which is great! Please see video for the full review!
customer_reviews.author: Youtube-Matt-Tube

customer_reviews.title: It’s worth every penny!!!
customer_reviews.text: I saw a lot of reviews on YouTube over this microphone so I decided to give it a try. I own a rode microphone and have been using it for about two years. I was ready to try something new but did not want to go broke either. After seeing so many reviews I decided to try it. All I have to say is for the price it’s been one of the best investments I could have made. The sound quality is way better than my rode microphone.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Anytime I moved the mic slightly, there would be ...
customer_reviews.text: Anytime I moved the mic slightly, there would be a ton of static and/or it would cut out and quit working. I believe it's broken. I'm going to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Kiser

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Using this has upped the production quality of my interviews by 1000% percent. I was using a rode shotgun mic, which is excellent, but this mic has really given a feel of intimacy and richness that was missing before. Great quality. I'm glad I made the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: 5th Pearl

customer_reviews.title: Nice mic for teaching English online
customer_reviews.text: I use this mic for teaching English online. It is a great mic, and my students can understand all of my corrections, and they are to repeat my articulations. I like this mic better than a headset because I never pop my Ps or get other distortions that happen when a mic is right in front of my mouth. Also, the alligator clip is quality, and it keeps the mic in place even on flimsy fabric.
customer_reviews.author: Manos Ariba

customer_reviews.title: Perfect solution
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, we're really impressed with the quality of the mic. It can get a little interference with cross winds (across the chest) but not bad at all. We just take care to protect it better if we're out in windy conditions. Quality is great, it handles volume well (loud speaking / noises), and picks up minimal background noise. We will probably get another one soon. Oh, and thanks for the extension cable! Really helpful
customer_reviews.author: Alyson S

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Mic
customer_reviews.text: I was suspect of the quality of this mic, given the low price. It is an excellent mic! It produces authentic quality sound and picks up close proximity sound and rejects background noise to a good degree. The sound quality is actually better than a Rode mic I also use for the same application!
customer_reviews.author: Dr. D.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this microphone a lot! This just fits my budget and it works really well. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: mild otaku

customer_reviews.title: For my gopro
customer_reviews.text: I use it for my go Pro thanks power de wise really pro ! and as good as my other lavalier more expensive
customer_reviews.author: guigui

customer_reviews.title: A really good value for a great microphone
customer_reviews.text: Super happy with this little microphone. Crisp audio into both my iPhones and my DSLR. The clip is sturdy, and that is important when you are working in the field and getting on and off a motorcycle. I use it two ways (so far), into my wireless receivers and straight into the iPhone for interviews and B-roll. The wind guards are small, but so far have responded with clear audio even when a breeze blows up - in fact, I was really surprised after a shoot when I expected some audio interference and there was so little it was easy to take out. I have paid double the price for Lavalier's and not had the quality of this little guy.
customer_reviews.author: Donald E. Giannatti

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!  Replaced with exact same model after we lost the previous one on a trip.
customer_reviews.text: Great mic. Lost our previous one on a recent trip. Bought an exact replacement because the first one had been so valuable and great sound quality! Pros: simple to use, compact, comes with soft case -- and most importantly great sound and a long extension if needed. Cons: none. One small learning curve on our initial use of our first one. We recorded a video and played it back but there was no sound. Eventually realized we needed to unplug the mic from the headset/mic jack ... and then the sound played fine. Bottom line it works great and give great quality sound that you couldn't accomplish with the phone's built in mic. Thanks PowerDeWise team for a great product!
customer_reviews.author: lindaw

customer_reviews.title: Had to return.
customer_reviews.text: I had to return this item because it didn't work well at all with Android even on a native phone. Once you open the package they give you a piece of paper that tells you to download this third party video recording app which entirely defeats the purpose of the lapel microphone as it is useless for streaming or recording media on the well-built application that comes default with the phone. Don't know how well it works with iPhones, but skip this if you're looking to plug it into an Android phone.
customer_reviews.author: Naivety

customer_reviews.title: Died within three months
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately within a few months the microphone died completely. I took it to a filming assignment and found that it didn't work with or without the adapter on my phone or Zoom H2 sound recorder. Unfortunately the return window closed two months ago and I had not realized the mic was dead until now.
customer_reviews.author: John G

customer_reviews.title: Great Mic, see video!
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: I loved this mic so much I purchased a second one, it sounds just as clear as the first, I did a recording (voice only), paused it and swapped mics, resumed the recording. During playback, it was seamless! I couldn't tell where one changed to the other, very nice! I would HIGHLY recommend this to ANYONE who would like to improve their audio on videos, or just record a lecture. The quality is incredible from such a low cost item! PowerDeWise has really outdone themselves! Keep up the great work!
customer_reviews.author: William L. Wynne II

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work with iPhone X and Lightning to 3.5mm adapter...
customer_reviews.text: The description is a little too generic - while it might work with older iPhones and iPads, it does NOT work with the iPhone X using the Lightning to 3.5mm adapter. I'm told there is a work around for it, or another adapter that will work. It does work nicely with an older iPad and a camera so the purchase wasn't a total bust. It'd be nice if the description is updated to reflect the exact models it will work with.
customer_reviews.author: retiredhiker

customer_reviews.title: Quality Lapel Mic with Noise Cancellation for a Very Fair Price
customer_reviews.text: All around an excellent package. The mic has very good record quality for things like Skype and streaming presentations/videos at a reasonable price point, the clip feels well made, and the included extension cord is definitely useful. I can't say I'd use it for singing or professional voice work, but those aren't my areas of expertise. Would probably be perfect for doing interviews for a podcast or documentary since it hides a lot of the background noise, while keeping voices clear and crisp. A vast improvement over the gaming headset mic by Creative Labs I was using before. I'm very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick L.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent microphone, outstanding service.
customer_reviews.text: The microphone works very well with my laptop voice recorder application with the Windows 10 operating system. The microphone package comes equipped with a 4-to-3 pin adapter makes it functional with the laptop microphone jack. I had some questions about functionality when I received it, and PowerDeWise responded quickly to resolve the problem. The long 79" extension cord is an excellent feature. I am very pleased with this product and the responsiveness of the representative, Vasiliy, in assisting me with initial questions that were quickly resolved.
customer_reviews.author: David E. Hall

customer_reviews.title: It was a great disappointment
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy when I received this mic and started to using without having any test. This was a serious error. On my videos I could hear a buzzing noise, like a small electric motor. I blamed everything for the noise, except the mic, until I did a test with an older cheap mic. I was surprised, there is no noise using this cheap mic. I threw this mic to the trash and keep the accessories.
customer_reviews.author: vriosm

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Sorry, but this mic doesn't work with my camera Nikon D3200 camera that I bought it for
customer_reviews.author: P. Forrest

customer_reviews.title: Great pro microphone with great accessories too !
customer_reviews.text: This was definitely a good buy, and a great entry-pro microphone, with great accessories too. I was considering buying one of those more famous but expensive brand, thinking that quality equal price with audio equipment. But, after reading some review and on line articles, as well as watching YouTube videos, I wanted to give this mic a try. And I was totally right to do it ! Amazing pro sound quality when plugged into my phone for instance, and also they included some other accessories, such as an extension cord and jack adapter. Now I can record my own YouTube video more professionally !
customer_reviews.author: Orcatrainer

customer_reviews.title: waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work AT ALL in my Sony recorder (which is what I bought it for), and it makes absolutely ZERO difference in the quality of recordings on my iphone. Professional grade? That's laughable.
customer_reviews.author: Spudly

customer_reviews.title: Excellent entry level lav mic for the price.
customer_reviews.text: For under $25, you can't really beat the quality and the included accessories that came with the PowerDeWise Lav mic. The sound quality is decent, it's easy to connect it to either my cellphone or using the 4pin to 3pin adapter, plug it into my handheld recorder or it can be plugged in directly into your DSLR for better environmental sound rejection compared to the camera's built-in mic. I have included different sound tests in my review video so you can listen for yourself and decide which application works best in your situation.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonAholic

customer_reviews.title: Does not work on Macbook Pro. Spend more to get something better.
customer_reviews.text: Does not work with a MacBook Pro. I purchased the USB adapter (extra $$) that THAT THE MANUFACTURER SUGGESTED I PURCHASE TO MAKE THE MIC WORK and it still does not work. Unfortunately, I did not test it out in time to get my money back. Everything else I use with the USB adapter works fine, but the MacBook does not recognize this mic. The mic works on my iPhone, so I know it is operational. The extension cord is a cheap joke and makes a hissing noise when used. The sound it produces on the iPhone is marginal at best. Spend more to get something better.
customer_reviews.author: JWS

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product. No more bad sound on your vids!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product at a great price. Fast shipping. Works great for videos, chat, and anything else. As a teacher, sound on my videos is key and this makes it so easy!
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten Landry

customer_reviews.title: Great Mic
customer_reviews.text: I produce alot of videos and I'm always carrying and using lapel mics. Typically an average mic lasts about 6-8 weeks before there's problem with it, like a short in the cord. This is the first lapel mic that has lasted a great deal longer. I got about 7 months of hard use out of it. Then I purchased another because of the great quality. I think someone that's just using it an average amout will have it for years with no problems. Also sounds as good or better then any other mic I've used, including much bigger and more expensive brands.
customer_reviews.author: HowardPlumpkin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for purpose but the sound quality is mediocre
customer_reviews.text: If you're going to sell a microphone, the one thing you need to make sure of is that the frequency response is appropriate for the application. In this case, the microphone's purpose is for speech. Clear speech reproduction requires a frequency response broader than just a few kilohertz. This microphone's sound quality is only slightly better than that of an analog telephone - that is unacceptable. Of course, the other unacceptable issue is the lack of a microphone equalizer built in to Windows 10 that could address this sort of problem. Otherwise, the rest of the product is sheer perfection. The cord length, and quality, and adapter for use with a PC (which is how I use it) is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Shreddin' Mike

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, great sound quality
customer_reviews.text: This mic works perfectly for recording classes I teach. My voice is always clear as a bell. Others’ voices may be a bit muted, depending on volume and their distance away from me, but the mic picks them up surprisingly well. I would absolutely buy this again. Note: I use an iPhone X for my recording, so I plug the mic cable into the analog-to-lightning adapter that came with my phone. It works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Bibliophile

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality, Very Small, Great Customer Support
customer_reviews.text: Sharpie for scale in picture Arrived in nice packaging, mic feels cheap but works great. I intended to use it with a PC, which requires the adapter. My box came without it but their customer support sent me a new one within a week.
customer_reviews.author: E. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great starter microphone
customer_reviews.text: Comes with a great lil well made pouch which is a great way to carry these. Also a wrap to fold them nice and tight to avoid tangle. The claw portion that clips to your shirt will not be coming off of your shirt it holds tight! The microphone absolutely improves the quality of your voice in video. All in all it is great microphone and well worth the price. If you're starting a YouTube channel or have a vlog of anything requiring you to record yourself this is great. I will update after a month of use but first impressions are great!
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: CAUSES EARRAPE + constant high pitch background noise.
customer_reviews.text: LOWEST QUALITY. Every other sentence you speak sounds like earrape no matter where you clip it. It's always at MAX volume. There is no way to change this. The microphone was just made that way.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Koala

customer_reviews.title: ... capture tutorials I make and the sound quality is excellent! It provides crisp
customer_reviews.text: I bought this microphone to be able to narrate screen capture tutorials I make and the sound quality is excellent! It provides crisp, clear sound and the price is right! I researched numerous reviews to decide which was the best for me and I decided to go with this one. I'm glad I did because it has worked out really well. I definitely recommend purchasing this lapel mic if you're searching for one. Yeah, there are others that are a little bit less, some a bit more... But for the price paid and quality received, this was the best deal to me.
customer_reviews.author: DesertShopper

customer_reviews.title: I am VERY happy that everything works
customer_reviews.text: I am happy that the package came on time, there were no missing parts and the microphone works as it should. I was kinda nervous that the microphone would not work with the audio recording app of my choice. It does perfectly. I also didn't have to do any major adjustments with my Motorola Android e5 Plus phone; just plug it in. One advice I have for folks that have phone cases, make sure you push the microphone jack all the way in to make sure it is connected properly. What's included in the box is shown in the picture I posted. I'm glad it comes with a case, extender and adapter cable so I am ready for all situations.
customer_reviews.author: Moorish Brooklyn

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. I used it twice and now it has some short or something in it. I have to wiggle it and pray and hope the sound is going through. When you're live on a webinar, there's no way to test sound. I plug it in and test. Seems fine. Start my webinar, and then people are saying, "can't hear you!" All my settings are correct. This is just a piece of junk. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Susie Larson

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars for Value/ Customer Support.
customer_reviews.text: I decided to try out this MIC for streaming because I hate the headset x mic look. For $22 bucks, you cant beat it. Noise cancellation is good, sound quality is good. Will not compare to something like a Yeti or AT2020, but that's obvious. Notice the stars for Sound and Noise Cancellation are 4, but Overall is 5. This is because the customer support through Facebook Messenger was absolutely amazing. Super Fast, explained how the mic handled noise cancellation, ETC. Could not ask for anything better. Give it a try for sure if you are interested. For $22, you absolutely can not go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: My wife started a cookbook review/cooking demo website and needed a microphone for the video portion. She wanted to make sure that the sound was clear, especially since she would be recording with her cell phone. She also needed something wireless or with an extra long cord so that she could move around the kitchen with ease while recording. This one fits the bill. The cable is nice and long. The sound isn't tinny or hollow. The only thing that would make it better is if the lapel clip was multi directional - but that's pretty minor.
customer_reviews.author: D. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, so impressed.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to record our wedding vows as recorded next to a windy lighthouse destination wedding using an iPad. This little thing worked amazing. Cord long enough and it didn’t pick up the wind at all. I was shocked at how great. Crystal clear sound quality. I did have this horrible buzz when I first plugged it in, but quickly realized it was because the iPad was plugged in charging. As soon as I took it off the charging cord, problem solved. Lesson is to use fully charged iPad or iPhone with this microphone as electric current really interferes with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The worst microphone I ever had...
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst microphone I ever had! I used it with my iphone outside when it was windy and you can’t even hear my voice. I also tried it with my dslr camera inside my apartment and it’s not working at all! I wasted my time trying to make it work but unfortunately it’s really bad quality and also if it touches your clothes you’ll have this extremely loud noice coming from the mic... I am really disappointed with this purchase. I might add a link to a video later so everyone can hear the bad quality and the noice coming from the microphone.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriela

customer_reviews.title: Works for me.
customer_reviews.text: I'm not an expert on mikes and sound, but I'm very pleased with this. It's great that they included the adapter (which I needed!) the extension cord, and a nice little pouch to keep it all. I was also very happy to find that the mike holder on the clip can rotate 360 degrees, so that it can still point up no matter how it's being clipped on. Very helpful. As for the sound quality, I've only used it once so far and in less-than-ideal circumstances, so I can't say much except I was satisfied with the results.
customer_reviews.author: T. Wear

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product! Good service.
customer_reviews.text: Originally I complained and gave a low rating for this product because the two I bought seemed not to work. But it was my error, and I apologize to this company for the misunderstanding. I have changed my rating from a one-star to five-star. This mic is made for use on smart phones and has adapters that must be used for PCs, cameras and regular recording devices. Once I used the adapters, the mics worked very well. The adapter, extension line, extra wind muffs, clip and pouch make this a very good buy for those who need to get reliable recordings in noisy environments. This is a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Brett M Dickerson

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Sound Quality, works with my iPhone 8+
customer_reviews.text: Amazing audio quality, especially for the price. Works with my iPhone 8+ using the adapter to audio jack that came with my phone. I am very happy with the rich audio quality I get when recording with this microphone. It picks up a lot of the deep bass tone in my voice and has a nice signal that I don't have to EQ in post to improve upon. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Absalonson

customer_reviews.title: Best value for money, if you can fix the first 4 seconds in post production
customer_reviews.text: The quality is unbeatable for this price point. We have another mic in the office that's wireless, and much more expensive. There is noticeable static interference, and it only records in mono. The ONLY issue that drives me insane with this mic is the (what seems to be) built in noise cancellation or equalization. After a buffer of 3 or 4 seconds of peaking audio, it will adjust and bring down the levels, but it does so quite quickly. It requires me to almost always adjust the audio at the beginning of the clip in post and bring it down about 2db. BUT...The value, and convenience of not worrying about a $300 equivalent mic is worth the trouble hands down.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Williamson

customer_reviews.title: It's a toy!
customer_reviews.text: First of all I'm so confused to see too many reviews that shows this is good quality mic , but seriously IT IS NOT, i connected to my computer and my microphone on my web cam it's hundred times better than this. I got same result to connect to my Canon camera and also Note 9 as well, Sound it's not pure and has slight noise. The design is good, wire that comes with package it's very generous to put many cables. but this microphone it's not something that is good even for semi professional result.
customer_reviews.author: M. Masoumi

customer_reviews.title: I bought this to record short videos on my phone ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to record short videos on my phone for my business. I find it difficult to attach the mic to my clothing in a way that looks neat. The clip is oriented to the way men's shirts button, and not women's. (Why men's and women's shirts don't button in the same direction is beyond me.) The clip is big, compared to the mic, so it pulls if I put it on a collar. Sorry I didn't return it when I had the chance for these reasons.
customer_reviews.author: True Joy

customer_reviews.title: Sound not up to par with similar lav mics
customer_reviews.text: I appreciate the simplicity of the mic but unfortunately the quality doesn't match some of the other mics at the same price point. The sound seems a little "hot" and sharp, harsh on the ears. I also have the Pyle lav mic and although that one you have to get an adapter to use on your phone or computer, the sound is a lot more comfortable to my professional sound equipment. I think it's great for recording notes or voice memos, but I would not recommend it for professional work.
customer_reviews.author: Chuanguo Xu

customer_reviews.title: works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: I have a backpacking and fishing youtube channel and I shoot video with a gopro 5 camera. This microphone works great. I read that I needed to purchase an adapter to connect it to the gopro external mic connector but it seems that they include one with it that works fine as far as I can tell. You can hear the audio quality on my youtube channel "wilderness with Amani". The clips about golden trout are shot above 11,200 feet elevation in heavy wind with gusts around 50 mph so that would give you an idea of how it handles windy conditions. I would highly recommend this product based on my experience.
customer_reviews.author: amani douglas

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working on my laptops
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this microphone for a few months to film videos for distance learning. With an adapter, it plugs into my Google Pixel 4 phone and my phone automatically recognizes the mic. If I use the extender, it will have a buzzing sound though. I had an issue with my computer suddenly not recognizing it and after troubleshooting through the computer and doing a factory reset, it still wasn't working. I emailed customer support, and within the hour they responded. They were able to give me the support I needed and (even though I totally already did the steps) it suddenly worked! I'm now able to record high quality read alouds and videos for my students!
customer_reviews.author: Rose Tyler

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT IMMEDIATELY WORK WITH MACBOOK AIR
customer_reviews.text: I will update this review once I see how it works. Since MacBook Airs only have a headphone jack, and DO NOT have the feature of MacBook Pros, which allow the headphone jack to double as a mic. jack, YOU WILL need an adapter. I currently ordered this adapter [  ] and hope to see if this Mic Works. Currently, it has not worked on my MacBook Air.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin RK Davis

customer_reviews.title: Nice sturdy clip- Very long cord with extension cord, and works Great
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good for the price. Not bad at noise canceling in windy conditions, or from background noises. Im mostly using this for youtube videos where the camera/phone is to far away to pick up vocals on the recording. It works very well, has a nice pouch to store everything in. the cord feels like silicone, but not certain it is, it should be durable and not tangle easily. I did have an issue with the extension cable plug being damaged when it arrived. So I messaged them and was sent a replacement very quickly. I would recommend this to anyone looking for an inexpensive wired microphone.
customer_reviews.author: james

customer_reviews.title: Very Great Lav Mic for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a lav mic and was my first time buying one and did not wanted to spend a huge a mount on a mic that at the end will not use as needed. I found this PowerDeWise and decided based on the reviews to make the purchase. I am really glad I did it because the quality of the mic is excellent, very simple to put it in use, great construction and materials. It came in a pouch for storage and with and adapter and extended cable. I am really pleased with this mic, recommended to anyone looking for a Lav Mic for any production.
customer_reviews.author: Nestmac

customer_reviews.title: Great Surprise!
customer_reviews.text: This is third mike I try with my Mac Pro, the other mikes were similar to the Mac's mike. This one showed a definite decrease of surrounding noise; the performance is so good that there were people lawnmowing the grass about thirty feet away, and I could hear them to the point it was affecting my ability to hear the other person. They were able to hear my voice, and heard none of noise from the landscaping!!
customer_reviews.author: Bernardo

customer_reviews.title: Using Your iPhone for Video? You'll Want a Much Better Mic and This is It.
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the built-in mic on the iPhone is terrible, at best. I wanted a decent lav for doing voice-overs as well as talking head shots on my iPhone. For $40, I am really happy with this mic. There were no issues plugging it in and getting the phone to recognize it immediately. The quality of my audio is substantially higher now and the extension cable that comes with it allows me to move my iPhone almost anywhere I want and still keep the cable nicely hidden out of view. I'd definitely recommend this to any smart phone vlogger who wants to instantly improve the quality of their audio. This is for an iPhone 11.
customer_reviews.author: RobTop Contributor: Fountain Pens

customer_reviews.title: Good quality Mic - Tested in Adobe Audition/MixPre vs $100 Deity mic
customer_reviews.text: Tested this very quickly as a lapel mic on professional Deity wireless lav's. The spoken sound was excellent and we compared them side-by-side with a Deity $100 lav mic into a MixPre-3 and compared sound and wave form in Adobe Audition. tThe Deity mic was a bit more dynamic but overall you'd never notice in an interview session. It's all there. To the ear it's almost the same. Well worth the money and a good first or backup mic if you're not able to go to $50-400 professional mic's. You may not see hear the difference. Mic's othen fail so well worth getting a few backp's like these. Comes with extension and adapter. The adapter was needed for the lav.
customer_reviews.author: MF-VA-DC-MD

customer_reviews.title: Decent but QUIT WORKING after couple months
customer_reviews.text: I was a little leery of buying this mic in the first place because I saw in other reviews that it all of a sudden started having static feedback sound. The first couple months were good. Improved my audio a lot. Just went to film today and there's the buzzing sound everyone was talking about! Super bummer! Can no longer use this mic to film with as the static sound is pretty loud and noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: Dixie Giddens

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product as described!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product as described! To my personal experience, if one wants to use a Windows laptop and hear voices from the built-in speakers during Skype or Zoom conversations while having this product plugged-in, one needs to tweak or configure some in Sound via Control Panel. It needs to have correct devices selected for Playback and Recording, manually. By default when having it plugged-in into the headphone jack (3.5mm), one hears nothing from the speakers but uses the product for recording. So, go ahead to configure Playback and Recording in Sound if you need to use the laptop's speakers to hear other parties' voices while using this product as a microphone in online meetings.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, clip broke :(
customer_reviews.text: Quality: Sound quality is good and in my view at a professional level for things such as YouTube. Connection: I was not able to get it to work with my laptop. That was ok insofar as I was recording from my phone, but it would have been nice to use it with my laptop. I did get it to work with a different laptop, so it may just require fiddling. Sturdiness: The clip fell off somewhere and I can't find it. So, that is disappointing. It still works but just doesn't clip on. I had used it lightly (only a few recordings) and I wasn't expecting that to happen so soon.
customer_reviews.author: Moonstalker

customer_reviews.title: Cute little case
customer_reviews.text: But that's about it. It doesn't work... on my Canon 7D MKII, my Canon 6D MKII, my mixer, my iMac or my iPhone. It doesn't matter how I configure it... with or without the adapter. It does generate a little static, if I wiggle it. I'd return it but it's not worth my time to pack it up and go into town. So, I'll chalk it up to being a lesson learned... you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Charles N.

customer_reviews.title: Was great for all of 10-15 hours, then broke.
customer_reviews.text: I thought the sound quality was fair for the price I spent. Much better than using the camera or phone sound as is. I was happy with the purchase until it broke. The mic lavaliere broke within a few uses. The actual mic stopped working after about 10-15 hours of use after a few weeks. Very disappointed. Maybe it was because I let it sit in the package for a year before opening it and using it? Doesn't seem like there should be an expiration though. None-the-less, I will be looking at another brand for a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: magdalene vail

customer_reviews.title: not FOUR like this one AND the other one I'd ordered
customer_reviews.text: This mic DOES NOT WORK WITH A GOPRO. That's not a defect of the mic, so I didn't want to dock it points. It took me a month with a brand new Hero 6 Black... trying different adaptors and even sending the camera back to GoPro before finally stumbling onto a YT video that explains that you have to get a mic with only three metal sections on the plug... not FOUR like this one AND the other one I'd ordered. Hope this saves someone the same heart ache and hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Wadkins

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work with widows 10. Period!!!
customer_reviews.text: I plugged this mike into my Dell XPS with Windows 10. When it didn't work, I went to the product website and followed each of the suggestions (changing privacy settings, selecting microphone in the control panel, etc), but none of them worked. I have a presentation due tomorrow that I will now have to record with the onboard mike. Given that this microphone doesn't work with a very common operating system, I don't think this should be listed as one of amazons suggested products.
customer_reviews.author: Ross L.

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly great quality for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Cons: - Cables are thin, but do not feel cheap. Pros: + Works great after a few months of use. + Great microphone quality for the price. Big improvement over headset microphones. + Lavalier clip solid and easy to work with. Easy to put almost anywhere. + Comes with extension cable, adapter, extra muffs, velcro straps, and storage bag. Final rating: 5/5 stars. Highly recommended. Great quality and extras.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Great product, phenomenal service
customer_reviews.text: The mic is excellent - you wont find a better bang for your buck. I have used it on calls, xbox, pc and other mediums and everyone is impressed with how clear my voice comes through. It is an excellent mic But the company is outstanding. My product arrived with the small clip partially broken, and they went far out of their way to help. They responded very quickly to my messages, and when they realized the clip I needed was not in stock, they promptly sent me an entirely new unit so I would not have to wait. 100% Recommend
customer_reviews.author: Joey O

customer_reviews.title: So many things I did NOT know!
customer_reviews.text: I did NOT know it came with a zippered bag! I did NOT know it came with 2 extra windsocks! I did NOT know it came with a cool little lens cleaner for your camera! I did NOT know it has a total of approx. 13 ft of wiring. I did NOT know the lapel clip is made of very good quality metal! I did expect that the quality would be OK simply because it's closer to me. I did NOT expect it would really be so balanced without post EQ work! If there were a sixth star......
customer_reviews.author: Vantage Point Videos

customer_reviews.title: Works half the time so if that's what you need buy it today!
customer_reviews.text: Used it for the first time today while hiking. Only half my clips have sound. 50/50 on day one and again on day two. I was extra careful to plug it in all the way each time I used it. No idea why it's not working and I'm beyond my return window. Also the plastic connection on the metal clip broke before I even got to use it once. I had to put it back together each time I used the mic. I am wholly unimpressed. $22 thrown away.
customer_reviews.author: Vonzo

customer_reviews.title: Strange Connector meant for Phones/Tablets, Not Cameras or PC's
customer_reviews.text: Too me a second to figure out it needed the adapter to work with my camera and once I started using the adapter the audio was way too hot even on my camera's lowest volume setting. Looking over some of the other reviews I wasn't the only one who had problems regulating the volume. Tested with my PC and it still took some fidgeting with the settings to keep the audio from being too hot or too low, hard to find a middle ground. When I did use it with my phone the volume was much more reasonable. I can only conclude that this product is way more focused and suited for a phone or tablets than any other devices.
customer_reviews.author: Tobias Elmore

customer_reviews.title: BEST BANG FOR YOUR BUCK
customer_reviews.text: This microphone is a great value for the cost...It works flawlessly and the extension cable provided is a real bonus.The difference in sound quality on my videos is like night and day. As good as the product is, Eugene and his staff are a model that any business should follow when it comes to customer service. Prompt and courteous when answering any concerns or answering any questions...
customer_reviews.author: KODA

customer_reviews.title: Instead of getting the "other" brand, why not try this and save some cash?
customer_reviews.text: Having only used one other brand (you know the one) lavalier, I must say this really sits close to the same quality os the "other" brand. It picked up my voice clear as day from under a thick beard (obviously, I got somes scrapping sounds of my beard, but that was my fault). The sound clarity was very clear and didn't ahve any pops or hums, it didn't pick up any of the ambient noises from my living room, and the audio was in synch with the video. I will certainly grab another one of these for my 2-person videos I plan to produce. GREAT quality!
customer_reviews.author: Chan&Felicia

customer_reviews.title: Constant buzzing.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for interviews and my business videos. I used this only a handful of times (had it less than a month) and now the audio is constantly buzzing. This ruined an interview. I have to reshoot it because the audio is unusable. I'm very disappointed. This is not professional grade and I cant recommend this to any professional. Spend more money. I tested my device with other mics. No buzz.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Good, but not great, microphone
customer_reviews.text: The microphone records, but is soft most of the time. I have to speak loudly to get it to record in a manner that is easy for the listener to hear, and without background noise drowning out my voice.
customer_reviews.author: Albert Lilly

customer_reviews.title: Works great to record audio on FB Live from iPhone
customer_reviews.text: I found this mic to work well, giving good audio for my FB live from an iPhone. I am very satisfied with it. The cord seems stronger than others I have used. Also, the clip seems to be higher quality. This is a small thing, but the little pouch that it comes in is very handy to keep everything in to keep it all together and easy to put in my pocket and go.
customer_reviews.author: G. Ray

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, love the extra long cord & adapters
customer_reviews.text: Replacing my old mic with this one, I was pleasantly surprised that (for the price) the sound is crystal clear. There's a very small undertone of ambient noise that I needed to suppress later, but it was overall not bad at all. The extra long cord allows me to move further away from my camera to get a wider coverage... PLUS I can use it as the "other person's mic" if I need to. Comes with a bunch of adapters for use with other devices (phones, etc.) Also has a nice little zipper case to keep everything in one place. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Mr Tony

customer_reviews.title: Very minimal difference
customer_reviews.text: I tried using this both on s10e and dslr and there was a buzzing sound. The volume isn't so high. Its basically you're not using a microphone at all. I compared it a few times side by side, experimented with it but the difference with and without this microphone on my s10e is not noticeable. But if there were a lot of noises you can still some background noises but you're voice will be highlighted a little bit more. My kid talked softly while we were on the room and someone on the microphone was on the other side of the house and it was still heard. Overall, I wouldn't get this. Would return if I could.
customer_reviews.author: M.B.

customer_reviews.title: works with phone, not with a recording device
customer_reviews.text: This will not likely work with any professional or semi professional recording device. I don't understand how these things work but I do know it works on my phone but not my handheld recorder. I was hoping it would work my handheld recorder but there's no way of knowing and there's no indicator what this will or will not work with. I did find hey Mike which works with my recorder but it is kind of weird looking. Sony, I'm looking at you. The sound quality is okay. It's not a lot better than your phone as is but it is slightly more direct and has a slightly more pleasing sound. Not necessarily louder.
customer_reviews.author: Cal Sand

customer_reviews.title: Use the adapter (if necessary). Great Microphone
customer_reviews.text: I’ll be honest, at first I was very put off by this microphone because I had plugged it into my zoom recorder and wasn’t getting any signal despite having used numerous Lav mics in the past with it. Then I realized that I hadn’t attached the adapter, which after I put on allowed me to use the microphone perfectly. I ended up being able to use my microphone for a wedding video where I mic’d up the officiant And was able to get really smooth audio. He was very crisp and clear. It was honestly better than my expectations. Overall I’m really happy with this microphone and plan to get a couple more as back ups.
customer_reviews.author: Les Lederman

customer_reviews.title: Defective; Support slow
customer_reviews.text: Literally never picked up a single sound. Didn't matter if I used TRS or TRRS. I emailed support, and despite telling them in my initial message that "I've tried it on my phone, on a camcorder, on my laptop, on my desktop... " they asked for the "model number." So I went and gave them the specific models of all these disparate devices. They haven't gotten back to me yet. I assume they're looking up condescending "How to use a microphone" instructions for each of the devices. 🙄
customer_reviews.author: Ken Mortimer

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME INEXPENSIVE MIC!!
customer_reviews.text: For less than $25, this is an outstanding little Lad Mic. Raw Audio is good. Processed Audio is even better as you can tell in the video. Comparing it to an $80 Lav Mic I also own, I can say this comes about 95% as good, but that is subject to personal preference. For Vlogging/Podcast/Youtube I think you will be extremely pleased with this Mic
customer_reviews.author: memphismike

customer_reviews.title: Handy little mic
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to change to a lav mic with a shorter cable than the one I am currently using. This one is just right. The extension cable will come in handy if I need the camera a little further away. So far, so good. We'll see how it holds up, but it looks pretty good and the connectors are solid. It also comes with an adapter for cell phones and two extra windscreens.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: After owning it 6 months, my thoughts are in the Video.
customer_reviews.text: See attached video for how it performs after owning it 6 months In short for fast reading. The cord length is fabulous and the sound from the mic is good, as long as you can work out/around its ailments. Too close, it booms and crackles. too far away, whats the point. Be mindful of use with a cell phone while charging, you get horrible feedback.
customer_reviews.author: Christian

customer_reviews.title: the sound of my rode mic would not have been good enough to give my project the added sound quality ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm used this twice so far, and I have to say it works! I use it with my Zoom ZH1 H1 Handy Portable Digital Recorder, but I had to add the extension piece to get it to pick up audio. Not sure why, but it worked none the less on my test run and actual video shoot. Without, the sound of my rode mic would not have been good enough to give my project the added sound quality it needed. So glad I invested and got 2 of these from my 2 Zoom recorders without breaking the bank.
customer_reviews.author: Why Not

customer_reviews.title: Utter crap
customer_reviews.text: Really unhappy with this product. Spent hours upon hours trying to get this to work right, but it picks up EVERYTHING and amplifies it. I am ten feet away from an AC unit, and this thing picks it up, even with noise suppression. It ends up making it sound like running water at best. Every footstep, every mouse click, any ambient noise you can think of WILL be picked up by this thing. But having the microphone less than 6 inches from your mouth? You practically have to scream.
customer_reviews.author: Mister Idjit

customer_reviews.title: Mic produces a lot of static.
customer_reviews.text: I use lapel mics for videography. This mic produces a lot of static. Also, the mic falls off the clip very easily. RECOMMEND going to B&H Video and purchasing an Azden EX-503 Lapel mic. Same price, but excellent quality.
customer_reviews.author: Andre A. Darrigrand

customer_reviews.title: It works, sound is great and cord is long!
customer_reviews.text: Easy plugin and speak, the cord is long enough but also has an extension cord and a PC/desktop/DSLR adapter. I purchased this for online video classes. I tested with and without the lavalier mic. I was a skeptic that it would sound any different, I was wrong lol. The sound quality was amazing, clear and sharp. They also offer tech support through email and WhatsApp should you have any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Wildflower3

customer_reviews.title: Was not compatible with Android
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a decent product. Worked well when plugged into desktop's various audio/video programs. But was pretty bad when plugged directly into Android S3 tablet and S10+ phone using TRRS In tablet, volume was way up for first 5-10 seconds. Totally over modulated and distorted then automatically lowered itself to but still very poor quality. Muffled and no high range. Not as bad on phone but still hot and and muddy sounding. There is no way to manually adjust input volume on these devices either.
customer_reviews.author: CW

customer_reviews.title: Works great for weddings
customer_reviews.text: I attach this to the groom's lapel, feed it through his shirt, and plug it into my digital voice recorder kept in his pocket. This mic is simple but picks up outstanding, clear sound. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Gibble Fish

customer_reviews.title: Not great for remote podcasts
customer_reviews.text: This seems like a good microphone for in-person recordings. However, if your goal is to use this to record remote conversations for things like podcasts it doesn't really work. When you plug it in to your computer or phone, you can't hear anything. The device will try and use the microphone as an output as well, so you won't be able to hear the other person. Which makes it useless for that task. The sound fidelity as a mic though, is really good. So even though it's useless to me, I still gave it 3 stars
customer_reviews.author: sby

customer_reviews.title: Works well with iphone
customer_reviews.text: Had a few issues getting it to work. works well with iPhone. As a Lavalier mic this doesn't provide the best sound. ended up having to hand hold very close to mouth to get it to not sound muddy. If you turn up the gain you end up with a bit of buzz and still not great sound.
customer_reviews.author: EM

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves this mini mic
customer_reviews.text: This mic is so adorable, my daughter loves it. The mic clips on to her shirt, and the cord length is good for her. She said it sounds loud and clear when she's playing her Xbox, and fees comfy. It came inside of a suede pouch that zippers and has an extra cord and adapter. ✨✨
customer_reviews.author: Doasm Memoir: VBJ

customer_reviews.title: What You've been Looking for!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for hands free operation. The Y-connector is great for interviews which is something I do a lot of. Good product, well made and nicely packaged in a very practical way. And the service is wonderful both from PowerDeWise and Amazon. If you're looking to do professional grade work without a lot of personal clutter for your sessions, this is the way to go. TIP: Many times folks being interviewed get a little nervous(Yes, even big stars) when you set up with wires and connectors and such. And that can hurt your final interview product. This really is what you want and precisely what you need. So what're you waiting for?
customer_reviews.author: Stoney Richards

customer_reviews.title: Great overall quality at such a low price
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit worried for how cheap this mic is that it would offer much quality but I heard good comments on it so I tried, so far after mo ths of use I can say it surpasses expectations, the sound quality is rely solid and better then mics I have had what where double or even triple the cost, hugely better then mod mic I had before, the noise cancellation is good where I haven't had any issues, and the cable with the extension is rely long . Over all I would recommend a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Lexta

customer_reviews.title: Disappointingly inconsistent
customer_reviews.text: I'm a singer-songwriter-guitarist, and I've captured some decent audio with this mic, but I've also had situations (like today) where I shoot an hour of takes and find sound dropout and significant distortion in every single take. Bottom line is that I'm going to have to replace it. It's useless for me unless I can count on it to deliver the same sound in performance that it delivers in my sound checks. And, as others have said, the distortion isn't from the mic rubbing -- I placed mic to avoid that issue. I think it may just max out too easily with the guitar and be useful only for fingerstyle or soft strumming.
customer_reviews.author: Lizzy Bennet

customer_reviews.title: Great mic-go to the website and read the specifications and campare with other mics.
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding!!!!!! Please note: This is a unidirectional dynamic lavalier mic ;whereas, most are omnidirectional. It sounds great, and rejects outside noise very well. The output is not as high as a condenser lavalier, the clean signal can be raised in post production without noise floor issues. Great quality, and included useful extras including the extension cable, 3 ring to 2 ring adaptor, and nice little case. value for a very capable and useful microphone. The frequency response on this lavalier is spec'd like a professional handheld vocal mic. I was very pleasantly surprised by this!!!
customer_reviews.author: John Doe

customer_reviews.title: Great little mic!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this at the beginning of the Covid-19 mess because I was helping our church record content to put online. The camera mic was okay for some videos, but not great in large open rooms and such. I bought this primarily for preaching, testimonies, etc... and it has worked great! The only issue that I've had is trying to use it while having the camera plugged in creates a bad buzzing. I can only use the camera with the battery when using this mic.
customer_reviews.author: John Grady

customer_reviews.title: " The mic audio is not that great. I've been able to use my iPhone headset ...
customer_reviews.text: The first order, the extension cable was faulty. I returned it. The second order, the extension was also faulty and the extra 1/8 tip adapter and pop filter screens were missing. I'm done returning this item and wasting time. Unfortunately this fits the cliche of "you get what you pay for!" The mic audio is not that great. I've been able to use my iPhone headset and tuck the mic under my shirt to achive similar results. I gave it two stars, because I kept it but I won't be using it for anything important. You're better off spending extra money for something better.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Good item.
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is good for the price of the mic. The cord length needs to be longer if you are trying to do anything that is further away from the light than a few feet and phone is attached. Noise cancellation is good enough. Still picks up my fan in the back ground every so often. Overall is great for the price and size. It works great when used in close range to the light with phone in the clip holder. Worth the money. Would purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica L. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Just received my item. This is all that came with it! Really peeved right now. Will be returning!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Savage
